Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER out of all Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that are immediately preceded by Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Percentage of cases containing Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that eventually lead to Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of the variant starting with Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and containing Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER, compared to the total number of variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER followed by Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER relative to the total occurrences of all rejection activities (e.g., Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION, Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR, etc.)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER to Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that reoccur in the same case after resubmission
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER with case:Amount above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that appear in variants involving more than one resubmission cycle
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that are not followed by any further approval activity within the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER occurring as the final activity in a case
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER relative to the total number of all activity executions in the log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER occurring in 2017 versus 2018
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER in cases that originate from departments active only in 2017 versus those active in 2018
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
